scripts.all-test: npm run browser-unittest && npm run node-test
scripts.browser-unittest: sh scripts/run-browser-test.sh && webpack --config webpack.config.unit.js && npm run karma && rm -rf lib/**/tests/index.ts && rm -rf dist
scripts.browser-integration: webpack --config webpack.config.integration.js && npm run karma && rm -rf dist
scripts.test: tsc -p tsconfig.json && mocha --reporter mocha-teamcity-reporter -r ts-node/register integration-test/*.ts --timeout 18000000 --color true
scripts.identity: tsc -p tsconfig.json && mocha --reporter mocha-teamcity-reporter -r ts-node/register integration-test/identity.*.ts --timeout 18000000 --color true
